content: the halloween sparkle stitch mix throw is a completely customizable blanket crochet pattern that uses fun stitches and interesting techniques to create a stunning halloween blanket grab your supplies and let s make a halloween blanket in one of six sizes materials herrschners worsted 8 yarn 1 - 7 skeins total for 20 squares medium size throw blanket *breakdown of colors square colors and more sizing info is included in the pattern crochet hook in size i/5 5mm 2 1 https //tidd ly/4lz9tvz 2 https //shareasale com/r cfm b=2246760&u=780171&m=59159&urllink=&afftrack=
